name: 陳彥霖
objective: 本課程接續計算機組織，介紹處理器之之組成原理與設計概念，並且結合VHDL硬體描述語言與FPGA實驗平台，修課同學可以學習如何使用VHDL與FPGA平台自行設計處理器。
schedule:
Introduction to CAD Tools – VHDL Language (2 weeks)
Combinational Logic Systems using VHDL (4 weeks)
Synchronous Sequential Circuits and Finite State Machines using VHDL (4 weeks)
Advanced Topics in VHDL Design (3 weeks)
Design a Simple CPU Processor using VHDL (3 weeks)
scorePolicy:
Lab Practices & Reports & Course Participation: 70%
Finishing lab practice in the course time will get bonus scores.
Final Project: 30%
materials:
David A. Patterson and John L. Hennessy, “Computer Organization and Design: The Hardware / Software Interface”, 4th Ed., Morgan Kaufmann, 2008.
ISBN: 9780123744937, 東華書局代理.
